ValidationRule.description: Check to see if the Account /Reseller /Distributor BillingStreet field (150 chars limit)
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Closed Won'), NOT($Permission.BYPASS_ALL_VALIDATIONS_ON_OPPTY), OR( LEN(Account.BillingStreet) > 150, LEN(Distributor__r.BillingStreet) > 150, LEN(Reseller__r.BillingStreet) > 150 ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Sorry - The Account /Reseller /Distributor 'Billing Street' can't exceed 150 characters.
